tool_description: An API showing all the major news updates regarding climate change around the world.
name: Latest CLimate Change News
title: Latest CLimate Change News

api_list.name: Can get all the informations from various newspapers source.
api_list.description: It returns back and provides all the information from related news source that is picked.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all information regarding latest climate change happenings around the world.
api_list.description: So, built endpoint will return back all the data and information regarding climate changes.
